summary: ernestine shepherd , 77 , is one of the world 's oldest bodybuilders .   only started working out when she was 56 thanks to her sister .   when her sister died , she got depression and high blood pressure .   but thanks to the support of her family , she began training again .   she is now free from all symptoms , including acid reflux and high cholesterol .   gets up at 2.30 am every day , runs 10 miles , and works as a personal trainer .
